hirefrank.name: Frank Harris
hirefrank.title: A product executive with 20+ years of experience leading high-performing teams and products across companies like Slack, Etsy, and Google.
hirefrank.bio:
Frank's experience in the technology industry spans roles from engineering to executive leadership. His career trajectory showcases a unique blend of technical expertise, design sensibility, and strategic product management.

As a self-taught engineer, Frank joined Google as a UX designer and created the original transit icons for Google Maps. This work demonstrated his ability to bridge technology with user-friendly designs, foreshadowing his career path.

Frank's career continued to evolve as a Product Manager when he joined Etsy pre-IPO. He played a pivotal role in enhancing the platform's search and discovery experience with an innovative approach that led to the development of a new, high-margin revenue stream through advertising for sellers.

In his career, Frank has held product leadership positions at prominent companies like Slack, InVision, Casper, and Betterment, spanning B2B and B2C sectors, regulated industries, and both startups and public companies.

Frank's current focus is helping product leaders take the next step in their journey with his coaching practice.

He lives in Brooklyn, NY with his wife, two young daughters, and an Italian truffle dog that isn't of much use in the city.

testimonials.text: Frank had a material, double digit percentage, impact on our revenue within a month of our first session. He combines a natural caring and thoughtfulness with a wealth of professional experience. If this is your first time stepping into a product leadership position, or are just looking for a thought partner, I don't think you'll regret giving Frank a try.
testimonials.author: Tomas Reimers - Co-Founder, Graphite

packages.title: Leadership Coaching - 4x (Wise)
packages.description: Get expert guidance on product strategy, stakeholder alignment, and team scaling challenges. Navigate crucial conversations, company transitions, and career growth with confidence. Perfect for established as well as emerging product leaders ready to amplify their impact.

packages.title: Hands-on Coaching (IC Growth)
packages.description:
Accelerate your product career with focused, skill-building coaching.

- 2, 45 minute remote session
- Product feedback
- Stakeholder management
- Career development planning
